attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For some jobs you need to be willing to undertake random drug screening. People work hard everyday from menial tasks to MP's and they function and pay for some disfunctional person to remain in a comatosed state. I believe it should be a requirement that to recieve UB40 you should be willing to proof that you are not a frequent drug user incapable of staying drug free to gain employment. If you should not agree, you should not be able to recieve UB40.
